name: Tether (itch) (Diorgo)
description:
Tether is a third-person shooter with a little influence from vertical scrolling shooters.

It was made for the Physics Jam 2021.

INPUT

The game can be played with a keyboard or gamepad.

The controls can be remapped in the Remap Controls menu.

Default Keyboard controls:
Move: W, A, S, D
Attack: Left Ctrl
Jump: Space
Pull rope: G
Rotate camera: Q, E, R, F
Reset camera: T
